talents.name: Extreme Effort
talents.details: +2 to Strength Check or Strength Related Skills and takes a full round

talents.details: +4 to Strength Check or Strength Related Skills and takes a full round

talents.name: Advanced Extreme Effort
talents.details: +6 to Strength Check or Strength Related Skills and takes a full round

talents.name: Advanced Melee Smash
talents.details: +1 Melee Damage (stacks with prereqs)

talents.name: Evasion
talents.details: Ref save for 1/2 is ref save for none (Not in med/heavy armor)

talents.name: Uncanny Dodge 1
talents.details: Retains Dex bonus to defense when flat-footed or hidden attacker

talents.name: Uncanny Dodge 2
talents.details: No longer flanked

talents.name: Defensive Roll
talents.details: Blow that would lower to 0 or less can have damaged halved for DC=damage ref save

talents.name: Opportunist
talents.details: Blow that would lower to 0 or less can have damaged halved for DC=damage ref save

talents.details: +1 Grit per Tough Level

talents.details: For 1 action point, gain CON modifier to grit (not to more than full)

talents.name: Stamina
talents.details: Heal twice as fast as normal (+2 grit per level and +2 ability damage in an evenings rest) and 1/2 unconscious recovery time

talents.details: Will Save added to Listen or Spot check to avoid surprise

talents.details: For 1 action point, add wisdom modifer to any roll with normal AP bonus
